mapper.select: select productId,productCategory,productName,productSize,state,price, to_char(productDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') productDate,amount,color, originalName,saveFileName,filecategory,superProduct, storeName,storeUrl from product where productId=#{productId} and filecategory='list'
select DISTINCT color from product where superProduct=#{superProduct}
select DISTINCT productSize from product where superProduct=#{superProduct}
